Headline: #J14 Jeffery Jump, #15 Jeffery Local Temporary Northbound Reroute near Jeffery/Anthony
ShortDescription: NB J14 Jeffery Jump, 15 Jeffery Local buses temp. rerouted via Jeffery, Anthony, 85th, South Chicago, and Jeffery due to street blockage near Jeffery/Anthony.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #J14 Jeffery Jump, #15 Jeffery Local buses are temporarily rerouted via Jeffery, Anthony, 85th, South Chicago, and Jeffery due to street blockage near Jeffery/Anthony.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #3 King Drive Temporary Southbound Reroute near King Drive/Marquette
ShortDescription: Southbound 3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted via King Drive, 67th, State, 69th and King Drive, due to street blockage near King Drive/Marquette.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted via King Drive, 67th, State, 69th and King Drive, due to street blockage near King Drive/Marquette.
